text: Ficus aripuanensis is a species of plant in the family Moraceae. It is endemic to Mato Grosso and Pará states in Brazil. ==Sources== * aripuanensis Category:Endemic flora of Brazil Category:Flora of Pará Category:Environment of Mato Grosso Category:Trees of Brazil Category:Plants described in 1984 Category:Endangered flora of South America Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ficus aripuanensis
